verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehova davidu badhala byapakamuncukonumu Mata icci pramanamu cesenu yakobu balisthuni todan 2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehovaku nenoka sthalamunu cudaka, Yakobu devuniki nivasamu cudaka 2, Pravesimpanu na gudaramu nandu, Kannulaku nidra raniyyananenu 1{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Adi etalo nunnadani vintimi, Yaru polamulo adi dorekenu, Podamu randi tana nivasamunaku, Sagilapadudamu padapithamu yodda{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lemmu yehova krpatoda rammu, Balasucakamaina mandasamuto, Pravesincu nidu visranti sthalamuna, Yajaka bhaktulu utsahincaganu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ni dasudaina davidu nimittamu, Vimukhuda gakumu abhisiktuniki, Ni garbhaphalamunu ni rajyamu mida, Niyamituntivi nibandhana cesi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Davidu toda satya pramanamu, Cesina vadu matanu miradu, Sinhasanamupai nidu kumarulu, Kurcundurantivi nibandhanan gaikonan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Na nivasamukai ne korukonina, Siyonu ne nerparacukontini, Iccatane nenu vasiyincedanu, Divintunu dani nindaruluga{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Niti vastramuto yajakulandarin, Satruvulanu avamana vastramuto, Dhariyimpa jesi anandintun, Tejarillunu davidupai kiritamu{/lang-eng}
